description: Handle Operations for Compute Azure Bare Instances.

commands.name: az baremetalinstance create
commands.summary: Create an Azure Bare Metal Instance for the specified subscription, resource group, and instance name.
commands.syntax:
az baremetalinstance create --instance-name
                            --resource-group
                            [--azure-bare-metal-instance-size {S112, S144, S144m, S192, S192m, S192xm, S224, S224m, S224om, S224oo, S224oom, S224ooo, S384, S384m, S384xm, S384xxm, S448, S448m, S448om, S448oo, S448oom, S448ooo, S448se, S576m, S576xm, S672, S672m, S672om, S672oo, S672oom, S672ooo, S72, S72m, S768, S768m, S768xm, S896, S896m, S896om, S896oo, S896oom, S896ooo, S96, S960m}]
                            [--bmi-id]
                            [--hardware-type {Cisco_UCS, HPE, SDFLEX}]
                            [--hw-revision]
                            [--location]
                            [--network-profile]
                            [--os-profile]
                            [--power-state {restarting, started, starting, stopped, stopping, unknown}]
                            [--ppg]
                            [--storage-profile]
                            [--tags]
examples: az baremetalinstance create --resource-group myResourceGroup --instance-name myBMIInstance --location westus --sku S72

commands.name: az baremetalinstance delete
commands.summary: Delete an Azure Bare Metal Instance for the specified subscription, resource group, and instance name.

commands.name: az baremetalinstance list
commands.summary: List a list of Azure Bare Metal Instances in the specified subscription. The operations returns various properties of each Azure Bare Metal Instance.

commands.name: az baremetalinstance restart
commands.summary: The operation to restart an Azure Bare Metal Instance.
commands.syntax:
az baremetalinstance restart [--force-state {active, inactive}]
                             [--ids]
                             [--instance-name]
                             [--no-wait {0, 1, f, false, n, no, t, true, y, yes}]
                             [--resource-group]
                             [--subscription]

commands.name: az baremetalinstance show
commands.summary: Get an Azure Bare Metal Instance for the specified subscription, resource group, and instance name.

commands.name: az baremetalinstance shutdown
commands.summary: The operation to shutdown an Azure Bare Metal Instance.
commands.syntax:
az baremetalinstance shutdown [--ids]
                              [--instance-name]
                              [--no-wait {0, 1, f, false, n, no, t, true, y, yes}]
                              [--resource-group]
                              [--subscription]

commands.name: az baremetalinstance start
commands.summary: The operation to start an Azure Bare Metal instance.
commands.syntax:
az baremetalinstance start [--ids]
                           [--instance-name]
                           [--no-wait {0, 1, f, false, n, no, t, true, y, yes}]
                           [--resource-group]
                           [--subscription]

commands.name: az baremetalinstance update
commands.summary: Update an Azure Bare Metal Instance for the specified subscription, resource group, and instance name.
commands.syntax:
az baremetalinstance update [--add]
                            [--force-string {0, 1, f, false, n, no, t, true, y, yes}]
                            [--ids]
                            [--instance-name]
                            [--remove]
                            [--resource-group]
                            [--set]
                            [--subscription]
                            [--tags]
